Title: Workshop and training program  on ‘Basic Robotics’.

Paregraphs.Text: Jhulelal Institute of Technology, Department of Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering had organized a workshop and training program on ‘Basic Robotics’. The workshop was successfully conducted by Prof. Anil Bavaskar, Prof. Parinay Lavatre & Prof. Sanjay Balwani with overwhelming response from 1 st year students of BE. Basic Robotics is one of the hottest engineering streams in the world. The workshop had two sessions namely introduction on new technologies in robotics and hands on training to prepare robot. The sessions were taken on new invention in robotics, bicycle riding robot, micro robots, introduction of basic robotics parts & autonomy of robots. 30 basic robots were prepared by the students during the workshop. The workshop was successfully organized with support of Shri. Mahesh Sadhwani(Chairman), Shri. Virendra Kukreja(Secretary), Shri. Pramod Pampatwar(Director-Technical), Mrs. Madhavi Wairagade(Director- HR & Admin), Dr. Pramod Patil(Principal), Prof. Sanjeev Sharma, HOD (ETC).
